heading: HB00157
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A RENTAL SUBSIDY PROGRAM FOR INFORMAL SETTLER FAMILIES (ISFS) AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT since 2019-07-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00157
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A RENTAL SUBSIDY PROGRAM FOR INFORMAL SETTLER FAMILIES (ISFS) AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Establishes a housing and social protection program for the ISFs to lead decent lives and access to the formal housing market . Provides flat-rate rental subsidy to eligible low-income ISFs to rent accommodation in the private rental market for a maximum of five (5) years or upon availment of permanent housing, whichever comes first.
ALIAS NAME : “Rental Subsidy Program for ISFs Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELMONTE, JOSE CHRISTOPHER Y.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (000 2019-08-28)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ON 2019-07-23
